conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with clear cutaway geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric projection; walls have consistent height and thickness. Ground plane clearly defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high; rooms (Lounge, Bedrooms, Wet areas) are accurately placed and proportional. Separate garage structure preserved.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and bathroom fixtures are correctly localized. Bedroom furniture is present but slightly simplified.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render. No text contamination. Minor loss of detail in the laundry/robe nook geometry.

detected_errors.description: The balcony railing style is simplified compared to the planar intent, but geometrically consistent.

summary: A highly faithful 3D conversion that accurately translates architectural room adjacency and volumetric scaling from the 2D source.
